sprint_goal: Establish secure authentication foundation, deployment safety, and core geospatial backend capabilities.
epic_coverage: Identity & Access Management,Core Backend Microservices,Cloud Infrastructure,Mobile Applications
key_deliverables: MFA/B2C Policies; Rollback Pipeline; Geospatial Routing API; Mobile Sync Engine Core
demo_objectives: Demonstrate rollback in staging; Show MFA login flow; API demo of geofence ingestion
success_criteria: B2C policies deployed; Rollback verified; PostGIS enabled; Mobile queue logic unit tested
risk_factors: Azure AD B2C complexity; Mobile sync engine edge cases
mitigation_strategies: Senior resource on Auth; early unit testing of sync queue

sprint_goal: Finalize mobile offline capabilities, deliver admin geofence tools, and ensure GDPR compliance.
epic_coverage: Web Portals,Mobile Applications,Data Management,Identity & Access Management
key_deliverables: Super Admin Geofence Editor; Mobile Offline UI; GDPR Anonymization Job; Auth Integration Testing
demo_objectives: Draw geofence on map; Complete mobile job offline & sync; Run GDPR scrub job
success_criteria: Offline E2E tests pass; GDPR script verifies clean data; Map editor saves valid GeoJSON
risk_factors: Frontend/Backend integration timing for Maps; Offline conflict resolution complexity
mitigation_strategies: Mock API for frontend dev; Simple Last-Write-Wins strategy initially
burndown_target: Focus on closing Auth/Mobile tasks early
